resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105117</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105117</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bringing Water to a Lesotho Village</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Holen des Wassers zu einem Lesotho Dorf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apporter l'eau à un village du Lesotho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trazendo a água a uma vila de Lesotho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">_ port acqua un Lesoto villaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φέρνοντας ύδωρ σε ένα χωριό του Λεσόθο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Traer el agua a una aldea de Lesotho</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">invites students to conduct research and then simulate a Lesotho village water committee that is designing a water supply system to improve living and health conditions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lädt Kursteilnehmer ein, Forschung zu leiten und 
einen Lesotho Dorf-Wasserausschuß dann zu simulieren, der ein 
Wasserversorgungsystem konzipiert, um Leben- und Gesundheitszustände 
zu verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">invite des étudiants à conduire la recherche et 
puis à simuler un comité de l'eau de village du Lesotho qui conçoit
un système d'approvisionnement en eau pour améliorer des états de 
vie et de santé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">convida estudantes conduzir a pesquisa e simular 
então um comitê da água da vila de Lesotho que esteja projetando um
sistema de fonte da água melhorar condições da vida e da saúde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">invita gli allievi a condurre la ricerca ed allora 
a simulare un comitato dell'acqua del villaggio del Lesoto che sta 
progettando un dispositivo di per il rifornimento idrico per 
migliorare gli stati di salute e di vita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσκαλεί τους σπουδαστές για να πραγματοποιήσει την 
έρευνα και να μιμηθεί έπειτα μια επιτροπή του χωριού ύδατος του 
Λεσόθο που σχεδιάζει ένα σύστημα παροχής νερού για να βελτιώσει
τις συνθήκες διαβίωσης και υγιεινής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">invita a estudiantes que conduzcan la 
investigación y después simulen a comité del agua de la aldea de 
Lesotho que está diseñando un sistema de abastecimiento de agua para
mejorar condiciones de la vida y de la salud.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105117</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/bringing-water-to-a-lesotho-village</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
